partisan.translation[0].definitions[0].d: strongly supporting a particular political party, plan, or leader, usually without considering the other choices carefully
partisan.translation[0].definitions[1].d: relating to the fighting of an armed group against an enemy that has taken control of its country
partisan.translation[1].definitions[0].d: someone who strongly supports a political party, plan, or leader
partisan.translation[1].definitions[0].e: a media campaign to represent Democrats as angry partisans
